original_title: Prez says OMP expedites efforts to locate missing persons
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe said that the Office on Missing Persons (OMP) has initiated efforts to locate missing individuals.
He said that measures are being taken to speed up the data entry process, with the goal of completing it within three months.
"The issuance of the Certificate of Absence (COA) is also being fast-tracked," he said.
